labor needs to fall below 2 million for the Fed to be comfortable that it can achieve its
inflation goal.
The reduction in the labor market’s demand-supply imbalance is also evident in the ratio of
job openings to unemployed persons. There are 1.5 job vacancies per jobless person, down
from the record high of two job openings that was set in early 2022. More important,
